Text.Language: Aitwbh m~mok Panou]: ,w n/i n~naparaptwma: eybe tekmau nem pinis]: peniwt abba Parcwma.
I ask You, O my God,Â / to forgive my transgressionsÂ / for the sake of Your mother and the great,Â / our father Abba Parsouma.

We shall begin, O believers,Â / to praise God with psalies,Â / and glorify the TheotokosÂ / and the great Abba Parsouma.
